# Create your own project

Congratulations, you've explored, cloned a project and dipped into a __tercen workflow__.

Now we show you how to create them.

<center><img src="images/create_project_crab.png"></center>

The following steps are covered in the next few chapters:

* Create a team
* Create a project (in the team)
* Install an operator (for the team)
* Upload the crabs dataset (in the project)
* Create a workflow (in the project)
* Export data (in the project)

Enjoy the next sections!
